In England, in the seven days to 23 July, there were 225,914 new confirmed cases (401.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 July, there were 289,112 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 22% (63,198 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 July is 5,037,630 (8,949.9 cases per 100,000 population).
